formdata.value: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.

request.description:
Display list free product by filter and pagination

Parameter GET:
1. sort_col: kondisi,harga,berat,dimensi,nama (default)
2. sort_dir: asc,desc
3. kategori_id: untuk filter by b_kategori_id
4. keyword: for filtering minimal 2 char
5. page: page to
6. page_size: numbers of item per page
7. b_user_id: for filtering per owner / user /toko
8.

This API will change order from "pending" to "wait_for_payment". Invoice code will be generated here. Order with supplied ID are ready to pay.
This API will check qty of each ordered product to prevent inconsistency stock quantity.

Payment Date in Y-m-d H:i:s format.* Required
Payment Transaction ID, from Payment Gateway. Required

request.description:
This API will change order status from "wait_for_payment" to "forward_to_seller" and any payment occured on this order will accepted as PAID order. This API should executed after requesting payment gateway. Make sure, all responses from payment gateway are sent correclty to server.

NB: Please call this API ONLY for succeed payment. Mobile have to confirmed valid transaction from PG before executing this API.

Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy.
